comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: The correct name is Lázaro Chacón (not Lajaro) "Lázaro Chacón González (June 27, 1873 – April 9, 1931) was the acting President of Guatemala from 26 September 1926 to 18 December 1926 and President of Guatemala from 19 December 1926 to 2 January 1931." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/L%C3%A1zaro_Chac%C3%B3n_Gonz%C3%A1lez see also en.valka.cz/viewtopic.php/t/85518

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for your research B-59. We'll make the correction to the name the next time we update.
